description: TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOL. (A/1428) CALLING FOR DISSOLUTION OF THE UN COMMISSION ON KOREA.
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOLUTION (A/1427) CALLING FOR CESSATION OF U.S. BOMBING IN KOREA.
TO ADOPT S. AFRICA PROPOSAL ADJOURNING DEBATE ON ITEM 43 ON THE QUESTION OF SOUTH WEST AFRICA.

TO ADOPT USSR ORAL PROPOSAL INVITING REPRESENTATIVES OF NORTH KOREA AND COMMUNIST CHINA TO PARTICIPATE IN THE DEBATE ON THE U.S.-PROPOSED ITEM ON INVESTIGATION OF CHARGES OF UN BACTERIOLOGICAL WARFARE
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOL. (A/2335) CONDEMNING AND CALLING FOR A HALT TO ALLEGED U.S. KILLING  OF AND COMMISSION OF BRUTALITIES ON, NORTH KOREAN AND COMMUNIST CHINESE PRISONERS-OF-WAR.
TO ADOPT PRESIDENT'S PROCEDURAL RULING AGAINST THE POLISH PROPOSAL TO ADD ANOTHER ITEM TO THE AGENDA.
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOL. (A/C91/199) CALLING FOR IMMEDIATE WITHDRAWAL OF ANGLO-AMERICAN FORCES AND SPECIALISTS FROM GREECE.

TO ADOPT UNION OF S. AFRICA RESOLUTION (A/L.124) FOR THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY TO DECLARE OUTSIDE OF ITS COMPETENCE THE ADOPTION OF AD HOC POLITICAL COMMITTEE PROPOSALS ON THE QUESTION OF RACE CONFLICT FRO
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOL. (A/2031) CONDEMNING THE U.S. MUTUAL SECURITY ACT OF 1951 AS AN ACT OF AGGRESSION AND INTERFERENCE IN THE DOMESTIC AFFAIRS OF OTHER COUNTRIES.

TO ADOPT S. AFRICA DRAFT RESOLUTION (A/L.172) DECLARING THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY NON-COMPETENT TO ADOPT ANY AD HOC POLITICAL COMMITTEE DRAFT RESOLUTION ON RACIAL CONFLICT AND APARTHEID POLICIES IN S. AFRI
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOLUTION (A/793).
TO ADOPT NORWEGIAN ORAL PROPOSAL PROVISIONALLY POSTPONING ACTION ON A GENERAL COMM. RECOMMENDATION (A/829) TO INCLUDE AN ITEM ON THE INDONESIAN QUESTION IN THE AGENDA.

TO ADOPT PRESIDENT'S RULING THAT IT IS WITHIN PROCEDURE FOR S. AFRICA TO INTRODUCE A PROPOSAL CONCERNING THE CONFERENCE OF THE GENERAL ASSEMBLY OVER A GENERAL COMMITTEE RECOMMENDATION FOR THE INCLUSIO
TO ADOPT A USSR PROPOSAL ADJOURNING DEBATE ON AND POSTPONINGELECTIONS OF THE NON-PERMANENT MEMBERS OF THE SECURITY COUNCIL, TO THE FOLLOWING WEEK.
TO ADOPT USSR DRAFT RESOL. (A/L.118) CALLING FOR AN IMMEDIATE AND COMPLETE CEASE-FIRE IN KOREA AND ESTABLISHING A COMMISSION FOR THE PEACEFUL SETTLEMENT OF THE KOREAN QUESTION.
TO ADOPT THE UKRAINIAN DRAFT RESOL. (A/281) CONVENING THE 2ND GENERAL ASSEMBLY REGULAR SESSION IN EUROPE AND AUTHORIZING THE SEC. GEN. TO DETERMINE THE SPECIFIC PLACE THERE.

TO ADOPT USSR ORAL RESOL. REJECTING 8 DRAFT TRUSTEESHIP AGREEMENTS (A/258 AND ADD. 1 AND CORR. 2, CORR. 3, AND REV. 1) SUBMITTED TO THE ASSEMBLY BY ADMINISTERING POWERS AS BEING CONTRARY TO THE REQUIR
TO ADOPT POLISH DRAFT RESOL. (A/411) CALLING FOR WITHDRAWAL OF ALL FOREIGN TROOPS, MISSIONS, INSTRUCTORS, AND EXPERTS FROM GREECE.
TO ADOPT USSR ORAL RESOL. CALLING FOR WITHDRAWAL OF ALL OCCUPATION TROOPS FROM KOREA TO ALLOW EXERCISE OF SELF-DETERMINATION BY THAT STATE.
TO ADOPT FRENCH MOTION TO ADJOURN THE MEETING.
